results.title: Install Azure CLI on macOS
results.description: Learn how to install and run the Azure CLI on macOS using the homebrew package manager. The Azure CLI package requires macOS 13 or higher.

descriptions.content: Learn how to install and run the Azure CLI on macOS using the homebrew package manager.
The Azure CLI package requires macOS 13 or higher.

results.title: Microsoft Work IQ CLI (preview)
results.description: Learn how to use Microsoft Work IQ CLI and MCP server to query your Microsoft 365 Copilot data using natural language from AI assistants and IDEs.

descriptions.content: Learn how to use Microsoft Work IQ CLI and MCP server to query your Microsoft 365 Copilot data using natural language from AI assistants and IDEs.

results.title: Microsoft Power Platform CLI - Power Platform
results.description: Install Microsoft Power Platform CLI to create, debug, and deploy code components by using Power Apps component framework.

descriptions.content: Install Microsoft Power Platform CLI to create, debug, and deploy code components by using Power Apps component framework.
